description: This file defines the interface IButler in the WPEFramework's Exchange namespace. It declares the IButler interface with nested INotification interface, methods for managing IValuePoint elements, and various operational methods related to value points and source management.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: Interface for managing value points and notifications within the WPEFramework exchange subsystem.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving updates about added, removed, updated, or metadata-changed value points.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register for notifications about value point changes.

methods.name: Element (by name)
methods.description: Retrieve a value point by its name.

methods.name: Element (by id)
methods.description: Retrieve a value point by its identifier.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Get the source string associated with a module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Operate on a specified path in the value point hierarchy.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Create a link between a path and a module id.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Rename or move a value point.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Delete a value point at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Retrieve orphaned value points for a given module.

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
